price: 39. Uma aanu abuurin waxaan Xaq aheyn, badankooduse ma oga.
arabic: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
